name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Google Manufacturer Center
description: This is a repository of google manufacturer center APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google Manufacturer Center
apis.description: Public API for managing Manufacturer Center related data. Impact the way your products and product details appear within Google Shopping. You???ll attract more shoppers and elevate your brands online. With Manufacturer Center, you provide the images, descriptions, and product details to improve how your products appear to the world. That information helps create more effective listings on Google Shopping and other Google services. If anything changes, you can provide new product data at any time.
